name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"4de52786-9a18-400f-88de-1028e3431c98","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: format_call","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2e108f19-a58a-4a61-875c-48965f2ea7fc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"format_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function acts as a normalizer for the targets identified by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Its primary role is to bridge the semantic gap between "instantiating a class" and "calling a function." Specifically, when the code calls a Class (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), this function redirects the analyzer to focus on the class's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method instead of the class definition itself.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"426b2f6e-2027-4da5-91fb-975144d3343d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In Python, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"u = User(id=1)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" looks like a function call. However, the logic that processes the arguments ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"id=1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" isn't in the class definition block; it's inside the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a79aec11-ba27-40bd-ba54-82dd1795ccdc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the analyzer treated ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as the target, it would look for parameters named ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on the class definition itself (which don't exist).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"91726b03-beee-4087-811c-2dbcad5cf028","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By redirecting to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User.__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer correctly matches the passed argument ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" parameter defined in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def __init__(self, id):","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7b189504-575d-4661-9fcc-787fe254f1a1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"337f406f-294a-47a6-bc02-3ec773563ef2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Retrieve Definition:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It looks up the Definition object for the resolved call string (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0dcb5dfe-0423-44f1-8323-dcfb8d112690","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check Class Type:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks if this definition is a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Class Definition).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0a01274-c02a-4867-909b-03d3b855aeb8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Redirect:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"45d42cdc-7a9b-4f41-8bb1-829e2eff169b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it is a Class, it appends the initialization method name to the namespace (e.g., converting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.User.__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9079ab0b-bc35-41b3-ab19-542bef350aec","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It verifies that an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" definition actually exists.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7cc6b642-1680-45ff-9c93-97604de50215","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If found, it returns the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"8bc4e81e-ec12-4559-8d3b-842abc942ef7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Default:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If it's not a class (e.g., a regular function call), it simply returns the original call string unchanged.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c7e931b0-fe01-4d10-a489-9424803af89c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"p = Point(10, 20)","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c94cdd94-e2df-4af8-aa07-9c9327db1e8f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math.Point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d1316483-a2e7-4723-a818-f5aa1ae2b2cb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"format_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math.Point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a Class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"491b3449-a2ba-4598-9296-4b4657febebc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It constructs ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math.Point.__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"56ab5085-c11d-48b9-913f-ce5c8cc68dec","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math.Point.__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d5c6b2c1-1681-42a0-a19e-5cbfb7925351","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" knows to map the arguments ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"20","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the parameters of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"58b6bb3d-105c-4091-ae00-d8acc951e67f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
